Trample
Whenever Dawnglade Wildbear deals combat damage to a player, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Target player mills two cards.
{2}, {T}: Target player mills four cards.

[+1]: Draw a card, then you lose life equal to the number of cards in your hand.
[0]: Each player discards a card, then Keseran deals 2 damage to each player who didn't discard a nonland card this way.
[-2]: Keseran deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.
Creatures you don't control get -2/-0 until end of turn. Create a Glyph token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, Sacrifice this: Scry 1.")

Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

When Voyager's Vessel enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact, instant, or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.
